程序包javax.servlet的分层结构

程序包分层结构:
  • 所有程序包

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.AsyncEvent
    • java.util.EventObject (implements java.io.Serializable)
      • javax.servlet.ServletContextEvent
        • javax.servlet.ServletContextAttributeEvent
      • javax.servlet.ServletRequestEvent
        • javax.servlet.ServletRequestAttributeEvent
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet (implements java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig)
    • javax.servlet.HttpConstraintElement
      • javax.servlet.HttpMethodConstraintElement
      • javax.servlet.ServletSecurityElement
    • java.io.InputStream (implements java.io.Closeable)
      • javax.servlet.ServletInputStream
    • javax.servlet.MultipartConfigElement
    • java.io.OutputStream (implements java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable)
      • javax.servlet.ServletOutputStream
    • javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper (implements javax.servlet.ServletRequest)
    • javax.servlet.ServletResponseWrapper (implements javax.servlet.ServletResponse)
    • java.lang.Throwable (implements java.io.Serializable)
      • java.lang.Exception
        • javax.servlet.ServletException
          • javax.servlet.UnavailableException

接口分层结构

  • javax.servlet.AsyncContext
  • java.util.EventListener
    • javax.servlet.AsyncListener
    • javax.servlet.ServletContextAttributeListener
    • javax.servlet.ServletContextListener
    • javax.servlet.ServletRequestAttributeListener
    • javax.servlet.ServletRequestListener
  • javax.servlet.Filter
  • javax.servlet.FilterChain
  • javax.servlet.FilterConfig
  • javax.servlet.Registration
    • javax.servlet.FilterRegistration
      • javax.servlet.FilterRegistration.Dynamic (并 extends javax.servlet.Registration.Dynamic)
    • javax.servlet.Registration.Dynamic
      • javax.servlet.FilterRegistration.Dynamic (并 extends javax.servlet.FilterRegistration)
      • javax.servlet.ServletRegistration.Dynamic (并 extends javax.servlet.ServletRegistration)
    • javax.servlet.ServletRegistration
      • javax.servlet.ServletRegistration.Dynamic (并 extends javax.servlet.Registration.Dynamic)
  • javax.servlet.RequestDispatcher
  • javax.servlet.Servlet
  • javax.servlet.ServletConfig
  • javax.servlet.ServletContainerInitializer
  • javax.servlet.ServletContext
  • javax.servlet.ServletRequest
  • javax.servlet.ServletResponse
  • javax.servlet.SessionCookieConfig
  • javax.servlet.SingleThreadModel

枚举分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<E> (implements java.lang.Comparable<T>, java.io.Serializable)
      • javax.servlet.SessionTrackingMode
      • javax.servlet.DispatcherType
